ygData.subject: Re: Bard Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Interesting that you d say this... ratio wise, I believe the writhing staff (9/33) is the same as an ashenwood short spear, silvery war axe or silvery
ygData.messageBody:
> The
> Writhing staff is interesting, but like the various crystal staffs sort of a
> novelty weapon.
>

Interesting that you'd say this... ratio wise, I believe the writhing staff
(9/33) is the same as an ashenwood short spear, silvery war axe or silvery
scimitar (all 6/22) -- and it procs a 48 damage effect, which none of the others
do. It is also purely better than the claws (5/21) from a ratio perspective.

Now, I know that there are slow ratios and there are fast ratios... and that a
9/33 will actually do less damage than a 6/22 over most fights, but when you add
in the damage from the effect, I'd say they're all pretty much even.

Just wondered why it's considered a novelty.

Jyzan
